LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_Juggernaut_RotaryAut: This massive weapon, larger than entire humans, is designed to bring even the largest opponents down under a barrage of direct-fire artillery shells. Rotating barrels integrated with a high efficiency autoloading magazine ensure steady rate of lethal fire.\n\nDue to a design flaw - typical for juggernauts - this weapon will self-destruct if it leaves the hands of a juggernaut.
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_Juggernaut_ShrapnelC: This massive weapon, larger than entire humans, is designed to shred densely packed targets with a barrage of shrapnel the size of a bench. Rotating barrels integrated with a high efficiency autoloading magazine ensure steady rate of lethal fire.\n\nDue to a design flaw - typical for juggernauts - this weapon will self-destruct if it leaves the hands of a juggernaut.
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_Juggernaut_Headhunte: This massive weapon, the size of a full-grown human, is designed to fire long-range direct-fire artillery shells with pinpoint accuracy to take out key targets before they can retaliate. With a great deal of internal auto-correcting components, this weapon is a tank-buster by nature.\n\nDue to a design flaw - typical for juggernauts - this weapon will self-destruct if it leaves the hands of a juggernaut.
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_Juggernaut_Poleaxe.d: This massive weapon, the size of a full-grown human, serves the exact same purpose its smaller cousins serve: to close with the enemy and hack them apart. Of course, this tool is better at it than its ancestors - it is made of fine glitterworld grade materials and honed to perfection... and is large enough to splatter people rather than need to stab or cut.\n\nDue to a design flaw - typical for juggernauts - this weapon will self-destruct if it leaves the hands of a juggernaut.
